nodes.text: A battle was fought between forces loyal to the Galactic  Empire, under Admiral Teren Rogriss, and Warlord Treuten Teradoc's Greater Maldrood at Feriae Junction in 8.5 ABY during the Imperial Civil War. After the death of the warlord Zsinj in the battle of Dathomir, Teradoc, Rogriss, and Admiral Ackbar of the New Republic moved into Zsinj's former territory to capture what they could. Teradoc secured a victory at Junction, bringing many of Zsinj's ships to his side.
